channel.title: No-ip problems
channel.description:
well i have been hosting my server for a while then i woke up a week ago and bang i can't host server annymore :mad: :(
so i make new no-ip ip and portforward again but nothing helps none can log on my server and mopar says its offline annyone help me plz :| i will be verry gratefull for always and ever and if u come my server ull be co =)
greetings, Gauthier191

item.title: No-ip problems
item.dc:creator: @iamapker iamapker
item.description:
@iamapker wrote:

lol might sound stupid but check the no-ip thing you download make sure your ip has a smiley face next to it… i know its stupid but might be problem you never know

Read full topic

item.title: No-ip problems
item.dc:creator: @Gauthier191 Gauthier191
item.description:
@Gauthier191 wrote:

Did all of that 3times now nothing works :’(

maybe its my router i have a lynksis one

still ty fr the info

Gauthier191

Read full topic

item.title: No-ip problems
item.dc:creator: @Evanz Evanz
item.description:
@Evanz wrote:

re-connect router,
re-do no-ip AGAIN
re-do portforwarding AGAIN
re-do exceptions in firewall AGAIN
Cross your fingers and hope it works

Read full topic
